document_data.name: Shur
document_data.mainbody: '''Shur''' was a powerful [[human]] [[Wizard|mage]] who actively opposed violence against nature.
document_data.Description: Shur had a stern and wrinkled face, framed by long locks of gray and white-streaked hair. She was dressed in flowing red robes, covered with a black cloak.
document_data.Personality: A self-appointed protector of the wild, in particular [[tree]]s, Shur was abhorred by the destruction of nature. She considered such acts evil, and used her considerable magical talents to both find and stop them.
document_data.Possessions: Among Shur's possessions were a ''[[cloak of protection]]'' and a ''[[ring of mind shielding]]'', as well as a ''[[gem of insight]]''.
